answers.answer: yes, that is the big thing with preclamsia, high blood pressure. If you don't mind me asking... Are you having low blood pressure? If so what has your blood pressure been running??

This question was acutally for a friend.  I have been dealing with high pb since my third daughter which they put me on meds for and thank god has been great my whole pregnancy which I'm almost done w/.  yahhh!  but I was versed on the warning signs of Pre E because of the PB problems and it making me a higher risk.  However I have a friend the other day who they said needed to rush to the emergency room because she was seeing flashes?? They said this was an early sign of Pre E but her PB has consistantly been 70/56 sometimes lower but never over 90/70.  And this totally contridicts what my doc told me so I just thought some of you might know.

question: Do any of you know if you can have preeclampsia if you have extremely low blood pressure?  I thought high blood pressure was a must as far as sysmptoms went?
title: Preeclampsia question
